price: Das (ist eure Prüfung), und (wisset), daß Allah die List der Ungläubigen abschwächt!
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: dhālikum wa-anna al-laha mūhinu kaydi al-kāfirīna
